original_text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world, why, as though living in the world, are ye subject to ordinances,
korean_text: 너희가 세상의 초등학문에서 그리스도와 함께 죽었거든 어찌하여 세상에 사는 것과 같이 규례에 순종하느냐

sentences.original_text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ
from the rudiments of the world
why, as though living in the world
